response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant impact it can have on your business or personal endeavors. We are confident that you will find this investment to be highly beneficial. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
